version_description:
Fixed Piano screen crash & incorrect key position.
Added 3D touch support for Piano screen.

Spot a bug? support@songtive.com

Fixed Piano screen crash & incorrect key position.
Added 3D touch support for Piano screen.

Spot a bug? support@songtive.com

Added ability to create custom chords or modify existing chords: names, formula, description.
Major chord progression improvements: ability to change inversion right form chord progression screen, chord lookup/reverse lookup screens are integrated.

Added ability to create custom chords or modify existing chords: names, formula, description.
Major chord progression improvements: ability to change inversion right form chord progression screen, chord lookup/reverse lookup screens are integrated.

Added ability to create custom chords or modify existing chords: names, formula, description.
Major chord progression improvements: ability to change inversion right form chord progression screen, chord lookup/reverse lookup screens are integrated.

Added ability to create custom chords or modify existing chords: names, formula, description.
Major chord progression improvements: ability to change inversion right form chord progression screen, chord lookup/reverse lookup screens are integrated.

Added new control to display scale notes & intervals.
Added landscape support for iPhone.
You can control how fast a scale should be played.
Improved staff view to correctly display sharps and flats.
Improved iOS7 compatibility.
Comm

Added new control to display scale notes & intervals.
Added landscape support for iPhone.
You can control how fast a scale should be played.
Improved staff view to correctly display sharps and flats.
Improved iOS7 compatibility.
Comm

Added new “Play Panel” where you will be able to play chords/scales with different octaves and check how it sounds in the loop. Chord Play Panel can play continuous arpeggios.
Redesigned “Relative/Similar” scales section. We display scales from Favori

Added new “Play Panel” where you will be able to play chords/scales with different octaves and check how it sounds in the loop. Chord Play Panel can play continuous arpeggios.
Redesigned “Relative/Similar” scales section. We display scales from Favori

We need your help, guys - if you experience any inconsistent issues, please let us know: support@songtive.com or through our community forum: http://forums.songtive.com

The release contains major internal functionality redesign to improve performan

We need your help, guys - if you experience any inconsistent issues, please let us know: support@songtive.com or through our community forum: http://forums.songtive.com

The release contains major internal functionality redesign to improve performan
The release contains major internal functionality redesign to improve performance significantly; fixed crashes provided by our community.
The release contains major internal functionality redesign to improve performance significantly; fixed crashes provided by our community.

Extended Chord Progressions screen with automatic scale detection. Load/Save progressions screens show in which key a progression was created.
Added Swar notation (Hindustani) as a parallel one, you can control Sa position too.
Fixed crash bug with

Extended Chord Progressions screen with automatic scale detection. Load/Save progressions screens show in which key a progression was created.
Added Swar notation (Hindustani) as a parallel one, you can control Sa position too.

Fixed crash bugs for progressions.
Improved overall stability.
Fixed issues with Swar notation (Hindustani) as a parallel one, you can control Sa position too.
Community Forum: http://forums.songtive.com

Fixed crash bugs for progressions.
Improved overall stability.
Fixed issues with Swar notation (Hindustani) as a parallel one, you can control Sa position too.
Community Forum: http://forums.songtive.com

We added Arabic translation - thanks to our community! With that release, we squashed a bunch of bugs. Let us know if some of them are still there using our community forum: http://forums.songtive.com

We added Hindi translation - thanks to our community! With that release, we squashed a bunch of bugs. Let us know if some of them are still there using our community forum: http://forums.songtive.com

You asked, we answered. Improvements for scales are here. Piano Companion supports custom scales and ability to edit existing one. You can see how a scale is shown for a selected octave. The practice feature is available to help you learn scales.

You asked, we answered. Improvements for scales are here. Piano Companion supports custom scales and ability to edit existing one. You can see how a scale is shown for a selected octave. The practice feature is available to help you learn scales.

Piano highlights a root key for chords/scales. Bug fixes.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps us motivated to continue developing it.

Have a question? Tap Help in the app or visit forums.songtive.com.

This is a huge update for Piano Companion. We integrated our brand new engine from Songtive application which allows us to extend features more rapidly. The update introduces a new and more flexible root selector for Chords, Scales and other screens. Impr

Other stability improvements.

We are happy to announce another major update.
- We don't have separate reverse screens anymore. Reverse mode is a part of the chords and scales dictionary. Just tap on "By Keys" toggle.
- You can customize details screens for both Scales and Chor

We are happy to announce another major update.
- We don't have separate reverse screens anymore. Reverse mode is a part of the chords and scales dictionary. Just tap on "By Keys" toggle.
- You can customize details screens for both Scales and Chor

Another major update is here. We added support for dark mode in iOS13.
More and people were asking for that and it's finally here; we added the inversion control for Chord Details.
Removed enharmonic roots such as: Cb, B#, E#, etc.
Added advance

Asking for a better Circle of Fifths? Well, it's finally here! You can see relative chords right from the Circle of Fifths. You can freeze it and switch into chord mode to see each chord details and automatically play it.
The common chords section was

Happy New Year! We've started the New Year with a major update:
- The grand staff view was completely rewritten and supports the dark mode.
- We added a new screen 'Symbols' with note values/rests and more sections are coming.
- The Piano screen

Introducing Patterns for Chord Progression. You can record a pattern that could be used for specifying how to play a chord in a progression.

Let us know what you think, more updates are coming soon.

Happy to announce that Piano Companion became part of our Songtive Community. That means that you have the ability to contribute progressions so other users will be able to vote and reuse them in their creations.

You are not restricted to chords o
